## âš™ï¸ Usage
**Simple**
```bash
catsay Hello World!
```
# ![Screenshot](./assets/photos//screenshot.png)

**Color Options**
```bash
catsay Hello World! -c red
catsay Hello World! --color cyan
```
# ![Screenshot](./assets/photos//screenshot.png)

```bash
catsay --list-colors
```
